subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After playing 19 minutes and fouling out in Game 1, Blake Griffin shot 13 of 17 for 35 points in a Game 2 rout as the Clippers tied their series with the Warriors.
snippet: After playing 19 minutes and fouling out in Game 1, Blake Griffin shot 13 of 17 for 35 points in a Game 2 rout as the Clippers tied their series with the Warriors.
